case.state: Strip poker!? Pft! Like the time I conned my whole outfit outta their outfits? Hah! Priceless.
Poker? The kinky kind? Yeah whatever, I've got some steam to blow off.
Needed to get away from it all, at this point I'm up for anything.
The name's Caulifla. Better not try anything if ya know what's good for ya.
This place seems seedy. *sniff* *sniff*. Sure smells seedy.
This seems like somewhere I could have a good time.
Dodgy looking place this. Just know that something fun happens here.
Alright, this place has piqued my interest.
Well it's pretty pervy if ya ask me. But sure, what the hell.
If you're itching for a fight, that's fine by me.
Alright! Let's get this thing going aready!
I play this with the gang all the time. Not the stripping part, but...ah yah get what I mean.
I've played this with my gang, sometimes. As for the stripping part? Yeah, once or twice, haha.
Seriously, you run with an outfit of crooks and free-loaders all day, and suddenly this seems like a good idea.
What we waitin' for? Some blue guy with cotton wool hair to shout "begin"?
Anyone up for a fist-fight instead? Hah! Nah, I'm just playin'. I ain't mean like that.
Hopefully this'll go better than that last thing I was involved in.
Just don't cry when you lose.
Just don't throw the game or anything lame. A decent challenge makes winning all the sweeter.
Ah screw it, I guess I'm game then. Let's do this thing!
The hell?! I'm facing clones of me or something? Piss off! Ain't no cheap counterfeit Caulifla that can get the better of me!
Are you knockoffs secretly made of jello or something? Or voiced by Brian Drummond? Hey shut up, knowing who that is makes as much sense as this match does right here.
Okay then. Wasn't expecting no crazy mirror match when I woke up this morning.
Huh. Okay. So before tonight is out, I've either gotta beat myself, or beatmyself. Or watch myself get myselves off a few times. Err...have I got that right?
Huh? Is that me over there? Is that me stronger than me!?
...Oh, shit. What the hell am I up against here?
You...you've got that instant reflex power thingy. Whatever it was that Goku had when I faced him...oh crap.
(What the...it's like someone took that Jiren fella and multiplied him by a hundred. Maybe more.)
Whoever's bright idea it was to stick me in a room with all you clowns, they better find a way off this damn world real damn fast.
Hey you, ~player~. Yeah, fuck you.
Oh for fuck sakes. This is gonna be one long game.
Am I getting pranked right now? This has gotta be one of them shows where someone jumps out with a camera going "haha, sucks to be you" or something like that.
We doing this at a beach? Should've said so, I'd have put a costume on or something.
Hmm. Nice. I could stand to come to beaches like this more often.
So, what's this, some girl's slumber party or something? Can't say I was the kinda girl who got into those things.
Whose bedroom is this? One of yours, or someone else's?
Hmm. This the kinda place humans strip off in front of each-other? You're real weirdos.
Weird sorta vibe coming from this place. You people might wanna watch your backs.
Oh, nice! This should be a relaxing way to play.
Ahh. This is just what I need. Don't need the card thing, happy to just hang here and shoot the breeze for a while. Any takers?
Really? Here? Perfectly good bathhouse the next room over.That'd be way better.
Well, I guess stripping makes a little more sense here then it would other places.
Haha. Boy, this is gonna be even worse for you guys when you lose, playin' this here.
Well. Guess I can't lose now. Wasn't gonna, but, y'know.
Don't people usually sit 'round a table when they're playing cards?
Come on, come on. Hit me!
Okay then...~cards~.
Ugh. Getting rid of these.
~cards~ then. Good as any.
I'll try ~cards~.
I'm gonna need...~cards~.
~cards~. This'll get 'em, hehehe.
Hmm. I'll take ~cards~.
Alright! I'm feelin' ~cards~ of 'em!
Come on, today, please!
Just make it snappy, alright?
Hmm...~cards~.
Seen Botamo haul ass faster than you, dealer.
I reckon Magetta could deal these faster. He's got giant claws for hands by the way.
Gimme ~cards~ and we'll be golden.
~cards~. This old trick should work.
Tch. ~cards~.
You steam powered or something, dealer? Come on, I need cards over here!
We seriously got no chairs here?!
I got that and that so...~cards~ should do it, yeah.
Oh...oh heck yeah! You guys are toast this round!
Wait...hold up, is this hand what I think it is!?
Okay, gimme...no, shit! Give me absolutely nothing at all! Almost missed what I got right here, what with your weird Earth cards and all.
Heh. Works every time.
Business as usual.
None of ya need to hold back for my sake. I can take anything you can throw at me.
Twos are good, right? I'm just playin' with ya, my hand's rock solid.
These cards might as well be glowing.
Good. Real good!
So. Which of you guys are stripping? It won't me, so...
Heh. You think you're ready to take this?
Ha, haha! This is some super-elite stuff right here!
Hmm. Nice score I've bagged myself here.
Oh yeah, that's the stuff!
Bulls-eye. Direct hit. Ya get the gist of what I'm saying.
This game has pretty simple rules, and it's similar to one or two I've played before. This'll be an easy win right here!
Expected nothing less.
Yup, easy money. No, wait. We ain't playing for money. Just to keep our dignity intact, haha.
Stupid looking cards you've got here. The hell's a "Jack" supposed to be? Just call it a prince already.
Eh. Solid.
Y'know when ya nab yourself a score of stolen goods, and the score ends up being mediocre? That's this hand right here.
Well it ain't on Universe Nine's level of bad. More, like, one of them forgettable, middling universes or something.
Think you've got what it takes? Bring it!
Ain't nothing to scream over.
Hmm hmm...business as usual, pretty much.
Hmm. This is like the Super Saiyan Cabba of hands. Average.
Seen worse, seen better.
Kinda...mid-class. That sorta level. Yeah that sounds about right.
Hmm. Should be enough.
(Well, so long as they don't get lucky, we should be pretty good.)
(So, the others should be getting mostly...yeah, this should be fine.)
Hey, they sell drinks here dealer? Not until after!? Ugh, lame!
Solid.
Solid basics can keep a fight rolling sometimes.
I've seen worse than this.
Yeah, I've won with worse.
Wow. I'm looking at double figures now? You guys are complete trash.
Oh come on, a ten round streak now? Are you honestly that crap at this?!
Alright, I'm three for three. Let's keep this streak rolling.
Wait, I'm three for three now, yeah? Sounds about par for the course.
I'm building a real nice streak here.
Damn good combo I'm building right here.
Kinda nice to play in a competition like this. Y'know, one where the lives of my friends aren't all on the line.
Ever wanna hear a funny story, ask about a guy named Dr. Rota. I've still got no idea what
Well...it is what it is.
(I'll probably lose one or two things this game...what should I take off if that happens...)
This hand's top tier. Call me a liar.
I bet you punks still can't beat this...
Whoops. That ain't what I was aiming for.
You know, a good bluffer is hard to come by these days...
Ugh. Ain't got a good feeling about this hand.
Not what I wanted.
Ugh. Trash. Low level trash.
(Kay, so how am I getting out of this here pickle?)
Say what!?
Testing my patience with this hand, dealer!
(They've gotta get unlucky at some point...)
Hey, it ain't worth fighting if you ain't prepared to take a hit or two.
Ain't never gonna have fun in a fight if you ain't willing to take a smack here or there.
(Hmm. Seems luck ain't gone my way this round.)
What!? Oh come on! Start of the game and I'm already getting crap like this!?
Ah, jeez. This is gonna be one long game if I'm getting crap like this already.
Ugh. Thanks. That's just what I wanted right now. Dammit.
Hmm. Brave of ya, giving me this crap right off the bat. It's like you're looking to get punched or something, dealer.
Huh. Anyone else gotten complete crap right outta the gate? Or just me?
Well, ain't this a bucket of piss. And this hand's pretty bad if I'm being honest.
Hey! Dealer. What's your deal? You not heard of a warm up round? I'm still getting used to these stupid Earth cards and you're already giving me complete crap to work with!
You're some kinda dead girl walking? Huh. Well, that explains why you smelt kinda funky. Done a pretty good job hiding it though.
Did someone wish you back to life wrong or something? I mean, I've died to, sorta. Don't see me looking like you do right now.
Huh. So, you've died before? Guess that makes two of us. Can't keep badasses ladies like us down!
Hey, look at that. I got a pair of Corrins! Haha.
So, you're both called Corrin? That's kinda funny. I'd have guessed you were twins if ya hadn't said anything.
Hmm. I'm sensing a bit of raised energy here. Which universe do you come from? Six? Seven? You strike me as a Universe 7 type, maybe.
You've got a higher battle power, than some at least. Finally met someone here who knows how to throw down, have I?
Hmm. I'm sensing some raised battle powers here. Which universe do you guys come from? Six? Seven? You strike me as Universe 7 types.
Hmm. There's some energy in the air tonight. Finally met some people who know how to throw down, have I?
So, playing with royalty, huh? Like I give a damn.
Playing against royalty, hmm? Whatever, I'm gonna beat ya royally. Haha.
Playing against some pretty little princess am I? Gonna be kinda fun beating the pants off of you, hehehe.
So, we got a princess here today? Am I supposed to care about that or something?
Wow, this table ain't half flush. Don't think too hard about that line.
What's actually going on here, some sorta royal get-together is it? This how the high and mighty actually spend their time?
So, start of your week here on Earth? Ain't exactly your average way to start it. Then again, I ain't your average Saiyan. Maybe it's fitting.
So, start of your week is it down here on Earth? Don't ya got something better to do than playing this?
So, "Monday" huh? Kinda weird that you even have weeks here. What's with all the universe knowing what weeks, years and all that crap is anyway?
So hey, are we still in the Sixth universe? Or we in the Seventh right now? There being two Earths gets confusing sometimes.
Hey, which Earth are we playing on right now? I overheard Champa saying that there's two of them. Wanna know if I'm in my home universe or not.
Seems I'm ahead of the pack at least.
Was beginning to wonder if I was gonna lose anything.
Think that even the dumbest members of my crew would struggle to play as badly as you bunch are.
I'd say well done, but I'm winning, so...
Hmm. That sure took ya long enough.
Seems that you guys are starting to wake up. Finally.
Seems like you people are slow starters. Well tough luck, I ain't even using ten percent of my brain power right now.
No biggie. I've still got ground to give.
Wouldn't be much of a game if ya couldn't make me lose anything.
Don't care. Notice that I'm winning? Yeah, I've got brains as well as brawn.
Seems you guys are slow starters. Lucky me.
Finally got a punch in? Good, I was starting to get bored.
Eh, ya win some ya lose some. It ain't worth getting mad over.
Surprise, surprise. Ya got lucky, there's no more to say about it than that.
My turn, huh? Am I supposed to care?
The thought of losing a few little things don't bother me too much.
Fair is fair, I guess.
Good. I don't want ya to be complete pushovers.
So you've got a little talent, huh? That just makes this all the more fun.
Damn. Ya got me.
Got me. But don't go getting used to it.
Ah well, it ain't exactly the end of all creation to lose a hand.
Don't get cocky. This ain't gonna become a trend.
Huh, got my work cut out for me already? Good. I like a challenge.
Dressed up all prudish and fancy? Just means that I gotta bring my A-game.
See, I came here dressed for a fight. You lot wouldn't move half as well as me with everything you've got on.
Whatever, this doesn't mean anything.
Doesn't matter! Still gonna win and you know it!
Wait...am I losing? No way I'm gonna let it stay that way.
How much are you all wearing...oh I see, you're gonna make me work for this here victory then.
Games like this can turn in an instant, just like they can in a fight. Don't get cocky.
Damn.
Well you might not be strong, far as I can tell. But it's brains what matters in a game like this after all.
Hey, remember I'm playing with Earth cards here. They're weird looking compared to what I got back home.
Alright, alright. Playing with Earth cards here, gotta give me a chance to figure them out at least.
Hmm. Okay, so I think I'll take off one, and leave the other one where it is. Haha, nah. Should've seen the looks on your faces!
Well you got one of them, beat me again and you'll get the other...I'm kidding, don't get all bent outta shape about it, jeez.
I'm not going to be a sore loser and count each one individually...though I'm sure your reactions would be hilarious.
So we counting them as pairs here? Both of 'em together, huh? Yeah that's fair, we'd be here forever otherwise.
Y'know I think Goku said something about adding weights to bands like these. Sounds like a solid idea for training.
Oh well, not like I'm gonna need them right now.
Y'know these are actually super-stretchy, real easy to get off. Pretty damn comfortable to.
Like 'em? Made of the same stuff Saiyans make body armor out of. Won't be scratching these up anytime soon.
Oh yeah, ya like that? That's just how Caulifla rolls!
Mistakes like that will cost ya. Your clothes mostly, heh heh.
Tough luck, buddy. But ya still gotta strip.
Think you've got what it takes to impress me?
Gotta warn ya. It takes a lot to impress me.
Maybe next time, friend.
Looks like I gotcha there, didn't I?
I'm just gonna keep quiet and enjoy the show.
You nervous or something? Well, I bet having to drop ya clothes in front of me would be pretty nerve-racking, haha.
Ha! Ya like that, huh?
Well hello there, big, tall and mysterious. Got any surprises in store for little old me?
You've been pretty quiet so far. I ain't complaining, just stating a fact.
Hmm. You kinda remind me of someone. Ain't gonna tell ya who though.
Hey, I know a guy who's kinda like you. Got the same sorta vibe and energy about him.
(This is where we find out if my hunch was right or not.)
(Come on, buddy. Pull that trick again. Let's see if I'm right about you.)
Oh, don't mind me, Skippy. I'm just waiting for something over here. None of ya business as to what that is.
(If I'm right about this, I'm only gonna need to see it one more time to know.)
Think you could skip to the best bit already?
Wait, if you're using time-skip for this. What does that make what'cha doing right now, a skip-tease?
So, you gonna time-skip again, or ya gonna mix things up this round?
Well go ahead, Skippy. Show us what ya got.
Come on then, Skippy. we doing this one more time then?
On with the skip-tease then? Haha.
Come on then, human Hit. Think you can do your time-skip again for little old me?
Cute wings. Kinda redundant though, wouldn't you agree?
Hmm. You remind me of the battle royal I was involved in. Talking about the flyers specifically. I don't remember them being all that strong, but they were annoying to deal with.
Sure is Cabba in here right now. Oh, don't mind me, you just remind me a little of someone I know.
Make it worth our while, lady.
It ain't the end of the universe to show a little more skin y'know.
Ha! Gotcha.
Oh well. That's too bad for you.
You know the name of the game. Better get it over with.
Well, those cards weren't worth your while. Got something worth mine?
Hey, that was a pretty good shot, now wasn't it?
Ha! Gotcha lady.
Looks like I gotcha, lady.
Seems that move wasn't enough for this round.
Rough luck, lady.
I wasn't gonna miss that time, lady.
Guess I tagged you there, honey.
Looks like I tagged you there no problem.
You're big at least. But that doesn't count for anything when you're faced with me.
Well you're a big girl, buuut your energy is basically nothing from what I can tell. Sorry lady, you ain't no threat to me.
Wait, so you use plants for clothes where you come from? Psh, I'll take my threads over that green stuff any day.
Smells like a garden in here. You sure love your greenery, lady.
Heh. You seem kinda interesting. Your battle power seems a bit weedy though.
That's your third strike right there. Whatcha got for us then, hmm?
Looks like you're on your third strike. You got some special moment planned for this round?
You weren't gonna parry that hit away.
Hey. You seem nervous. Like, really, <really> nervous.
You've gotten yourself worked up over something. Is it the game, or something else that's bothering ya?
Yo, relax already. The point of coming here is to chill out and blow off steam, y'know.
Hmm. Something's eating you up. Whatever's going through you mind right now, trust me, it ain't as bad as you think.
Hey, girlie, it's okay, y'know? Ya don't have to fret about this sorta thing.
Alright, let's do this again. Come on, I know you've got this, you've totally got this one!
Alright Florina, don't think too hard about this next one. Just get it over with and feel proud for having done it.
No need to be shy. Do ya see me doubting ya confidence? No? Then what're ya doubting yourself for?
Remember what I said before. Don't overthink it. Just focus on getting it right rather than worrying about getting it wrong.
I'd say you're doing pretty well, all things considered. I mean you're still here, right?
So, who are you supposed to be, queen of the space pirates or something? Find it hard to believe that some low-life would doll up as fancy as you're dressed.
Wait, you're a space pirate? Hmm, maybe I'm in the wrong business, running my outfit down on Sadala. You must be making bank if you've got the time to doll up all flashy like that.
What are you, the queen of the space warriors or something? Has a harem of some hundred guys ready to attend to her every need?
You've got a wild streak to ya. Hehehe, I like that. You're my kinda person lady, I can tell.
Looking at you is like looking into a human-shaped mirror. We gotta similar sorta attitude to things it seems.
Heh. Besides the toy and your weedy battle power, I think I can see a few similarities between us both.
Heheh. Gazoontite.
The smell in here's gotten close to making me sneeze once or twice. Ya can tell this place don't get cleaned often enough.
Heh. Someone must be talking smack about ya or something. Girls like us tend to get that a lot, hehehe.
Wait, is that why humans shave their heads? Stops them from becoming complete pushovers when they sneeze? Ain't gonna change ya character if you've got no hair to change color.
So, are all humans like you? Hair turns blue and ya become all weak and frightened? Nah, that can't be right. There's Meia and that other girl, Sei. They're both alright.
So do all humans turn into total drama queens when they sneeze? Or are you just one of a kind?
Hmm. Alright, this act of yours is kinda funny. But you expect me to think you've become a loser just because you changed your hair somehow?
HAH! GOTCHA! Haha, sorry lady, was just curious if shouting would make ya piss yourself or something.
Heh. Maybe ya should be paying more attention to the game, 'stead of the one woman double act you're putting on for some reason.
Maybe ya should've stayed blonde. Ya seemed to have more smarts for this kinda thing than you do right now.
Wow. Who didn't see this coming.
Pft. What color hair we gonna get now? Make it multi-colored or something, maybe then you'll impress me.
I'd love to know the crazy thought process which lead to coming up with this act. .
Psh. Back to this gag are we? Can't wait to see the A material. Gonna drop your pants for me or something? That could be fun.
Alright. Now that you've decided to be fun again, let's see what you've got for us.
Yeah. blonde hair you is like you've gone Super Saiyan. Just it's your personality that improves instead of your power.
Ready to have some fun again? Good. Now let's get cracking!
Heh. Ain't you a fuzzy little thing. Are ya from Universe Nine or something? Hmm, nah. Seem a bit soft for that place.
I'm guessing you ain't from the Ninth Universe? Girl like you would be dog food within an hour if ya ended up there.
Heh. Look at you. You're fluffier than a marshmallow sandwich!
And you're outta here! Haha.
Well seems that you've just ran outta luck, Leggy. What's with the machine ya got there?
Well unless you've got any tricks up your fluffy little sleeves, seems like that's game over for ya.
Who are you, some kinda human space warrior? Whatever you're supposed to be, you don't exactly look happy about being here.
Wait, do some humans live in space? I thought they all lived on just one planet or something strange like that.
Uhh, kid? What in the world are you doing so far from home?
I mean, don't let me tell ya what to do. But are you sure you can handle a game like this? Ya don't exactly strike me as the type.
You, uhh, get lost here or something, girl? Mommy and Daddy are probably worried about ya. Why don't ya head home?
Hmm. I saw that staff of yours ya had earlier. You remind me of Vados, are you an angel or something like that?
You sure are tall and elegant, lady. Definitely sensing something godly about you.
Hmm. I didn't see you at the Tournament of Power. So, not an angel, a Destroyer or a Kai. What exactly are you then, lady?
Huh. That's weird. Can't sense no energy coming from ya. And judging by all your bling, you've gotta be a deity or something like that.
You seem to have a bit more...dignity than the other Gods I've met. Reckon I'd have a little more respect for them if more of them were like you.
Heh, you seem to have it together more than the Gods I know. Bet my home Universe would be in much better shape if you were running the show instead of Champa.
Y'know, can't exactly say that I think all that much about the Gods. Buuut, if you're playing a game like this, you certainly can't be all that bad.
You got a dangerous sorta look in your eyes. Looking to start some trouble I'd wager.
Oh yeah, I know another crook when I see one. What kinda business are you in? I'm involved with stolen goods mostly.
Well hey. I know another wild spirit when I see one. What's your story?
You strike me as someone who's angry at the universe for some reason. Can't say I blame ya, be interested to hear why though.
Woah there. Your costume okay over there? Looks like it's blown a gasket or something.
Steamy situation we've got ourselves in over here.
Hey, what do ya call it, your sensu thingie? Whatever it's name is, it seems angry for some reason.
Ugh, jeez. You ain't gonna be going on and on about the power of love or some crap all night, are ya? I've had my fill of characters like that already.
Oh I know your type, ~name~. It's all sunshine and rainbows and obnoxiously long transformations. You really think that crap has any place on the battlefield?
Ditch the trinkets then. Just don't be timid about it when you lose the next time.
You'd be surprised how many guys have something like that.
Not ready for the good stuff yet, hey lightweight?
(Wonder if that's worth anything? Might be worth pocketing when nobody's looking my way.)
Yeah, whatever. Get the small stuff out of the way sooner rather than later.
Just that, ~name~? Alright. Just don't make a habit of it.
You warming up or something? Hmph fine, just be quick about it.
Yeah, yeah. That's the kind of thing everyone throws out at first.
Who'd have guessed you'd take that off first? Everyone I'd imagine, it was kinda obvious.
You tryin' ta show off some clever technique you have, for playing blind I mean? Or you just into some kinky crap?
Coat. Blindfold. Straps on your wrists and ankles. People can read into a look like that y'know.
Hey, kid. Someone tell ya those clothes were some fearsome fighter's gear or something? 'Cause I think they pulled more than a blindfold over your eyes when they told ya that.
What the hell!?
Woah, jeez!
Wait, did I just miss something? That almost looked like Hit's...
(Okay, just watch real close and...there! Got it!)
(Think he's onto me? Nah, not a chance.)
If you want to catch my eye though, you've gotta do better than that.
Better be ready for when you have to lose the big stuff, ~name~.
Let's just fly right past that bit. Can you fly, ~name~? Pretty lame if you can't.
Do something more interesting next time. Kay?
You wanna interest me? Gotta give me more than that, ~name~.
Ain't gonna rock the dragon with those moves.
Yeah, the prelims are usually dull. Ain't nothing gonna change that.
Ah don't sweat it. Just be bolder next time, cool?
Wait, hold up. What was all that computer speak you were saying just then? Better not catch ya trying ta pull something here, Nines.
Doesn't seem like you've got a whole lot of personality, least you ain't showing it. That why you're here? To break out ya shell some more?
Hey wait, ain't that cheating if you've got some little doohickey giving ya clues about how to beat us?
Know what? Color me impressed. I took ya for a goodie two shoes who didn't have the balls to cheat.
Well seeing how trash you've been playing, maybe your clever gizmos ain't nothing compared to good old fashioned instinct.
Wait...did...okay, buddy. I'm gonna have my eye real close on you. I got an idea about you that'll be pretty crazy if it turns out true.
You...did you just...alright, I have a hunch about you Jotaro. And I'm gonna be watching real close from here on out.
Haha...ha, haa, haa! Oh I'm dead on! You're using an honest to crap time-skip, ain't ya buddy? That's incredible!
Oh I've GOT ya! I only know one other guy who can do it, but you're using a time-skip technique, aren't ya Jotaro?
Woah, crap! You actually are using a time-skip, I'd know that technique anywhere. You're freakin' awesome, buddy!
Oh HELL yeah! I knew it! You're just like Hit! Kinda act a bit like him, actually.
Ditch your little whatnots, just don't be timid about it when it comes to the big stuff.
Yeah, whatever. Get the small stuff outta the way sooner rather than later.
Alrighty, you go do that then, ~name~.
Just that, ~name~? Alright then.
You do you, ~name~.
You warming up or something? Hmph, fine. Just be quick about it sweetie.
Hmm? Oh right, the boring choice. Course it is.
Yeah, should've really guessed that you'd go for that.
For what it's worth, I know someone like you. And she's really come into her own recently. I bet you've got that in ya as well, ya just don't know it yet.
Oh, I see. You're a real worrier, ain't ya? I never saw the point in that. Either something goes bad or it doesn't. Anxiety will only ever break ya focus.
(Sure is Kale in here right now. And whoever her Caulifla is has got some real work on her hands.)
Ah, no need to apologize about it, We're all here to have a good time, right? Just let yourself go.
Huh. Anyone know if that's the last we'll see of her? Games like this ain't exactly for the feint of heart.
Hmm. Considering she was dressed up like a warrior or something, that don't exactly speak highly of her.
Wait, an afterimage? Or was that instant transfigur-whatever? Either way, that was one, quick getaway.
Huh. She stormed off. She moves fast for someone without a whole lotta power.
You're looking pretty glam over there, lady. Though, do ya know how to use that little sword? Struggling to picture you getting your hands dirty in a good old fashioned brawl.
So then, what's your specialty as a fighter...I'm guessing seduction? I think I saw a gal who used that as a gimmick.
So, what's your story then? You on a break from terrorizing the locals? You seem like the kinda gal who'd frighten most humans.
So, name's Launch, huh? Name like that's kinda making me hungry. Really sucks that we got no food in here.
Hmm. Ain't so sure about the leg-warmer thingies. Kinda digging the top though. Those straps are doing wonders for your figure.
I...huh? What? Wait, humans can transform? That's new to me.
Err...I...gotta be honest, I'm sorta confused as well.
Uhh...Launch? Mind telling me what, uhh, what happened just now?
Tch. Whatever. Just let me know when you decide to go back to being blondie again. I liked her better than you are now.
Well, whatever it is, let's just get on with this. I'm sure the answers are more interesting than you taking your little booties off.
Well this ain't gonna take long. You ain't exactly wearing much out tonight, are ya?
Oh this is gonna be easy. One or two losses and you'll be petting yourself up before ya know it.
Seems you didn't come prepared for this game, Leggy. You're gonna need to be crazy good at this if ya don't wanna end up getting familiar with yourself.
You call that a weapon? Hah! That's hilarious!
You call that a weapon? Well...I guess you could clonk someone on the head with that or something, haha.
Also, hold up, that a scouter you're wearing? Looks kinda beat up, any reason you ain't had it repaired?

Dammit!

Y'know, can't exactly say that I think all that much about the Gods. Buuut, if you're playing a game like this, you certainly can't be all that bad.

Woah, jeez!
